response.job_title: Staff Technical Support Engineer bei NI (National Instruments)
response.summary:
Chemical Engineer and M.Sc. in Water Science and Engineer with job experience of 2 and half years as innovation and technical support. Academic experience in chemical processes and analytic methods. 
Fluent in 3 languages (English, German and Spanish) and with communicative and entrepreneurial skills.
response.skills: Team Leadership, Team Management, Project Management, Industrial Safety, Chemical Engineering, Environmental Engineering, Environmental Management Systems, Environmental Consulting, Logistics Management, Estrategia empresarial, Liderazgo de equipos, Investigación y desarrollo, Research, Microsoft Office, Gestión de proyectos, Administración y dirección de empresas, Gestión de eventos, Trabajo en equipo, Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo, Event Management

profile_positions.description:
- Teaching and creation of technical courses and workshops
- Development of technical documentation regarding use cases and troubleshooting of NI products
- Ensured key customer success by supporting them in long-term technical projects
profile_positions.title: Staff Technical Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Support in the development of an automatized method to produce high entropy materials (HEM) from combination of rare earth metal oxides. Project developed by the institute of Nanotechnology (INT) under the supervision of Dr. Leonardo Velasco.

Support in the documentation and device production for the Radon measuring campaign in Baden-Württemberg. Project developed in the Institute of Security and Environment (SUM).
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

profile_positions.description: Technical support of the SAP platform for ABInbev Latam Branch for logistical and financial issues under supervision of Mr. Sudipta D and Ms. Ivy Muthoni.
profile_positions.title: Technical Translator

profile_positions.description: Legal and technical consultant in patents procedures from preliminary search to post granted procedures. Including patent search, draft and filing under the supervision of LLM Lola Kandelaft.
profile_positions.title: Patent Engineer

company.name: NI (National Instruments)
company.description:
At NI, we Engineer Ambitiously. We celebrate creative problem solving. And we take our customer relationships to heart. 

We believe in the power and potential of making connections—between people, ideas, and technology. In fact, connection is central to everything we do. We constantly challenge ourselves to find those connections because that’s what creates a path forward. This means bringing the right people together to build solutions that make a difference. It means combining fresh perspectives with new technologies to turn your vision into reality.

For more than four decades, we’ve set the standard in automated test and automated measurement systems. We’re proud to partner with the talented engineers and enterprises using our systems to solve the world’s most pressing technology challenges and build better businesses. From data and automation to research and validation, our tailored, software-connected approach is rooted in helping you engineer what’s next. As your trusted partner, we’re committed to helping you set your goals higher and reach them sooner.

We’re here for you, for each other, and for the next generation of innovators who think bigger, aim higher, and go faster. Let’s Engineer Ambitiously.
